item.title: My Computing History
item.description: Part one, hardware. My computing history begins with me pestering my parents until they got me a computer. I didn’t know what hardware was out there, but I knew I needed a computer. My first computer was the Tandy Color Computer 2. Image from wikimedia https://commons.wikimedia.org/wiki/File:TRS-80_Color_Computer_2-64K.jpg This computer was affectionaly dubbed the CoCo by its adherents elsewhere, but I didn’t learn this nickname until much later. LAter, I also learned that there were many computers with the TRS-80 moniker, spanning at least 3 processor families.
